required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Assessment of DAILIES TOTAL1® (DT1) Multifocal
clinical_study.official_title: DAILIES TOTAL1® Multifocal Clinical Assessment in Challenging Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate DAILIES TOTAL1 ® Multifocal (DTl MF) contact lenses in current multifocal contact lens wearers with symptoms of end of day discomfort compared to their habitual multifocal contact lens correction.

primary_outcome.measure: Binocular high contrast/high illumination (HC/HI) visual acuity (VA) at intermediate distance (80 cm)
primary_outcome.description: Measured in logarithm minimum angle of resolution (LogMAR)

secondary_outcome.measure: Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire-8 (CLDEQ-8) score
secondary_outcome.description: CLDEQ-8 score (assessment of contact lens discomfort) as obtained by adding the numerical responses to each of 8 items (range 0 to 37)

arm_group.description: Delefilcon A multifocal contact lenses in Period 1, followed by subject's habitual multifocal contact lenses in Period 2. Each product worn bilaterally (in both eyes) for 14 ± 3 days.
Subject's habitual multifocal contact lenses in Period 1, followed by delefilcon A multifocal contact lenses in Period 2. Each product worn bilaterally (in both eyes) for 14 ± 3 days.

intervention.description: Multifocal contact lenses worn in a daily wear, daily disposable modality (new pair of lenses each morning)
Multifocal contact lenses worn per subject's habitual prescription and habitual daily wear modality

facility.name: Contact Alcon Center for Trial Locations
